page.title: 16Beating The Bounds
page.content: During Rogation-tide the parish clergyman used to walk round the parish boundaries with his church officials and other parishioners and followed by the boys of the parish school.The boys carried willow canes and at various points struck the boundary with them.Because it was such a bad experience,being bumped on stones,dragged through hedges and ditches,and thrown into streams and ponds,it was thought that the boys would never forget their parish boundary. Our school took part in a local Beating the Bounds walk.It was held on the 11th of May 1985 and it was 10\ miles.
